Verify the 'Submit' button is enabled, visible, horizontally centered, has width 120px, height 40px, background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, font size 16px, font family 'Arial', font weight 600, border radius 4px, padding 10px 20px, margin top 15px, and aria-label 'Submit Form'
Verify the 'Submit' button, when focused, changes border to 2px solid #0056b3 via 300ms transition

Verify the 'Email' input field is enabled, has placeholder text 'Enter your email address', border 1px solid #ccc, padding 8px, background color #f8f8f8, opacity 1.0, x coordinate 50px, y coordinate 100px, width 250px, height 36px, and aria-label 'Email input field'
Verify the 'Email' input field's label displays 'Email Address' with font size 14px and color #333333

Verify the main product image element has source 'images/product_hero.jpg', loads within 500ms, has natural dimensions 800x600px, rendered dimensions 400x300px, alt text 'Product image for product X', displays 'Shop Now' watermark, is visible, centered horizontally, has top margin 20px, bottom margin 30px, and no border
Click 'Play Video'

Verify the video player element starts playback, is not muted, becomes fullscreen, has width 100% viewport, height 100% viewport, visible controls, source 'videos/promo.mp4', and aria-label 'Promotional Video Player'
After 5s, verify the 'Skip Ad' button becomes visible with text color #ffffff and background color #ff0000
Verify the primary navigation bar is visible at top (y coordinate 0px), has width 100% viewport, height 60px, background color #333333, and contains 5 menu items
Verify the 'About Us' link is selected with text color #ffd700, font weight 700, and 2px bottom border in #ffd700
Verify each menu item has 15px horizontal padding, 20px vertical padding, and text align 'center'
Verify the user list table contains exactly 10 rows, has 1px solid #ddd border, 5px border radius, x position 100px, y position 200px, and data value for date '2023-10-26'
Verify each table row has height 40px, background color #f0f0f0 for even rows, and #ffffff for odd rows
Verify the 'Username' column header has font size 14px, font family 'Open Sans', color #555555, and padding 10px
Scroll the 'Notifications' panel to scroll-top 0px and scroll-left 0px
Verify the 'Notifications' panel has maximum height 300px, overflow 'auto' style, background color #ffffff, and aria-label 'Notification list'
Verify the first notification item, 'New Message', is visible, positioned at top 10px, has font size 16px, text color #000000, and opacity 1.0
Verify 3 unread notifications are counted in the 'Notifications' panel
Verify the 'Heart' icon is visible, has height 24px, width 24px, color #ff0000, positioned at x 900px, y 50px, shape 'heart' polygon, no border, margin 5px, and aria-label 'Add to Favorites'
Click the 'Heart' icon
Verify the 'Heart' icon color changes to #888888, and its opacity transitions over 200ms

After successful form submission, verify the 'Success' message appears centered horizontally, has background color #d4edda, text color #155724, font size 18px, padding 15px, fades in using 500ms animation, has border radius 5px, border 1px solid #c3e6cb, width 75% viewport width, and text 'Your order has been placed successfully.'

Verify the 'Product Card' for 'Item A' is visible, has width 280px, height 350px, background color #ffffff, 1px solid #e0e0e0 border, border radius 8px, 15px inner padding, 20px outer margin, text content includes 'Price: $29.99' with font weight 700, and aria-label 'Product details for Item A'
Verify the 'Product Card' for 'Item A', on hover, changes background color to #f0f0f0 and applies 2px shadow via 250ms transition
Verify the 'Cart Item Count' element's initial value is 0

After adding an item, verify 'Cart Item Count' updates to 1, its text color changes to #007bff, font size increases to 20px, has background color #e0f2f7, padding 5px 10px, border radius 50% for circular shape, x position 850px, y position 20px, and animation 'bounce' for 300ms on update

Verify the 'Save Draft' button is disabled, has background color #cccccc, text color #999999, font size 14px, font family 'Verdana', no border, opacity 0.6, width 100px, height 32px, label 'Save Draft', 8px top margin, 12px horizontal padding, and aria-label 'Save current draft'

Verify the main page heading 'Welcome to Our Store' is visible, has font size 32px on viewport width > 768px and 24px on viewport width <= 768px, text color #1a1a1a, font weight 800, text-aligned 'center', top margin 40px, bottom margin 20px, line height 1.2em, letter spacing 0.5px, x coordinate 0px, right 0px, and label 'Page Title'

Verify the 'New' badge element is visible, has background color #ffc107, text color #212529, font size 12px, font weight 700, border radius 3px, padding 3px 6px, positioned top 5px right 5px relative to parent, text content 'New', width 30px, height 18px, and aria-label 'New product indicator'

Verify the 'View All Products' link has text 'View All Products', is enabled, has text color #007bff, font size 16px, font family 'Roboto', y position 700px, x position 15px, value 'https://example.com/products', 0px border, and aria-label 'Browse all available products'
Verify the 'View All Products' link, on hover, changes text color to #0056b3 and has an underline

Verify the hero section's background element has background image source 'images/hero_bg.jpg', opacity 0.8, height 450px, covers full width of viewport, no padding or margin, top position 0px, image loads within 1s, dark overlay with rgba(0,0,0,0.4) background color, and aria-label 'Hero background image'
Hover over the 'Help' icon

Verify the tooltip appears after 300ms, is visible, has background color #333333, text color #ffffff, font size 12px, padding 8px 12px, border radius 4px, text content 'Click for assistance', positioned at x 100px y 200px, fades in with 200ms transition, width 150px, height 30px, and aria-label 'Help information'
Verify the 'Upload File' input is visible, enabled, accepts file types 'image/png, image/jpeg', and its label is 'Upload Image'
Select 'my_picture.jpg' in the 'Upload File' input

Verify the preview image appears with source 'blob:http://...', rendered dimensions 100x100px, 1px dashed #ccc border, alt text 'Uploaded image preview', circular shape with 50% border radius, and load time < 200ms
Verify the 'Download Progress' bar initially has value 0%, width 300px, height 20px, background color #e0e0e0, border radius 10px, and aria-label 'Download progress bar'

As download progresses, verify the inner bar's width updates to 75% for 75% completion, its background color becomes #28a745, has animation 'fill' over 500ms, and text '75% Complete' is visible with color #ffffff, font size 14px
Verify the 'Image Carousel' displays 3 items, has width 100% viewport, height 400px, background color #f5f5f5, and aria-label 'Product image carousel'
Verify the current carousel slide has opacity 1.0, and inactive slides have opacity 0.5
Verify the 'Next' navigation button is visible on the right (right 10px), has font size 24px and color #ffffff
Verify the carousel's scroll position changes horizontally by 100% of its width on navigation
